top_stories.title: Indonesia and Malaysia block Grok over non-consensual, sexualized deepfakes
top_stories.description: Indonesian officials said Saturday that they are temporarily blocking access to xAI’s chatbot Grok.
top_stories.author: Anthony Ha
top_stories.content: Indonesian officials said Saturday that they are temporarily blocking access to xAI’s chatbot Grok.

top_stories.title: Stronger laws for tech firms to ensure you don’t see unsolicited nudes
top_stories.description: Dating apps and social media platforms must now prevent cyberflashing, as it becomes a priority offence under the Online Safety Act.
top_stories.content: Dating apps and social media platforms must now prevent cyberflashing, as it becomes a priority offence under the Online Safety Act.

top_stories.title: AI Copilot Keeps Berkeley’s X-Ray Particle Accelerator on Track
top_stories.description: In the rolling hills of Berkeley, California, an AI agent is supporting high-stakes physics experiments at the Advanced Light Source (ALS) particle accelerator. Researchers at the Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory ALS facility recently deployed the Accelerator Assistant, a large language model (LLM)-driven system to keep X-ray research on track. The Accelerator Assistant — powered by Read Article
top_stories.author: Scott Martin
top_stories.content: In the rolling hills of Berkeley, California, an AI agent is supporting high-stakes physics experiments at the Advanced Light Source (ALS) particle accelerator. Researchers at the Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory ALS facility recently deployed the Accelerator Assistant, a large language model (LLM)-driven system to keep X-ray research on track. top_stories.title: Sentiment Analysis with Text and Audio Using AWS Generative AI Services: Approaches, Challenges, and Solutions
top_stories.description: This post, developed through a strategic scientific partnership between AWS and the Instituto de Ciência e Tecnologia Itaú (ICTi), P&D hub maintained by Itaú Unibanco, the largest private bank in Latin America, explores the technical aspects of sentiment analysis for both text and audio. We present experiments comparing multiple machine learning (ML) models and services, discuss the trade-offs and pitfalls of each approach, and highlight how AWS services can be orchestrated to build robust,...
top_stories.author: Caique de Almeida, Guilherme Rinaldo, Paulo Finardi, Victor Costa Beraldo, Vinicius Caridá
top_stories.content: This post, developed through a strategic scientific partnership between AWS and the Instituto de Ciência e Tecnologia Itaú (ICTi), P&D hub maintained by Itaú Unibanco, the largest private bank in Latin America, explores the technical aspects of sentiment analysis for both text and audio. We present experiments comparing multiple machine learning (ML) models and services, discuss the trade-offs and pitfalls of each approach, and highlight how AWS services can be orchestrated to build robust,...

top_stories.title: Migrate MLflow tracking servers to Amazon SageMaker AI with serverless MLflow
top_stories.description: This post shows you how to migrate your self-managed MLflow tracking server to a MLflow App – a serverless tracking server on SageMaker AI that automatically scales resources based on demand while removing server patching and storage management tasks at no cost. Learn how to use the MLflow Export Import tool to transfer your experiments, runs, models, and other MLflow resources, including instructions to validate your migration's success.
top_stories.author: Rahul Easwar
top_stories.content: This post shows you how to migrate your self-managed MLflow tracking server to a MLflow App – a serverless tracking server on SageMaker AI that automatically scales resources based on demand while removing server patching and storage management tasks at no cost. Learn how to use the MLflow Export Import tool to transfer your experiments, runs, models, and other MLflow resources, including instructions to validate your migration's success.
